Hi All - 

This might interest those in=
 the area of Topeka, Kansas. I've been in contact with these people regardi=
ng the group of tsuba in their collection but I've no idea as to their qual=
ity or reliable documentation, but it might be worth checking out next mont=
h. The display will be at the 
Mulvane Art Museum, Topeka, Kansas
They advi=
sed...
------------ ---
Opening this Summer at our museum will be a large c=
ollection of Tsubas (54), Yatate (39), and over 50 Japanese color woodcut p=
rints in one exhibit. The exhibit will open July 5, 2009 and will be on dis=
play through January 17, 2010. 

Mulvane Art Museum
17th & Jewell, Topeka, =
KS
785.670.1124
mulvane.info@ washburn. ed

Ron
